title: Yasuo HD Rework WIP
body:
I've been working on the textures of Yasuo's model. I'm using some techniques to give the low res model more depth. I'm also trying to make Yasuo more "manly" looking. Here's a before and after of what I have so far. Feedback is much appreciated! SHOULD I CONTINUE?

UPDATE DECEMBER 3, 2016


OLD MODEL

http://i.imgur.com/xy5zZSn.jpg


NEW MODEL

https://puu.sh/sDg7j/85b8957e37.png

https://puu.sh/sDg2k/fb54485ac3.png

FIXED UP HIS NOSE

https://puu.sh/sDfYl/de1629a44e.gif

replies.body: Holy shit Yasuo is high as fuck lol
He's been buying weed from yi, The WUJU Blazeman
but japanese people can't grow beards
Well for some raisin, Riot gave him a beard. Besides -- I'm Japanese and I have a beard :D
then you would be the first japanese guy i know of with a beard

Actually, the bags under his eyes definitely  adds more to his character. Especially with his line "Sleep is for the guiltless" Keep up the good work
 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
It's good, but it looks like someone didn't get 10 hours of sleep XD
